title: Did EVIL Come Out Of This Ouija Board? | Horror Podcast
description:
Today on a Ouija Aware episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

When a young child and her aunt decide to play with a wee gee Board late one night, they are in for more than just a simple game. 

They soon find themselves caught up with a dark energy urging murder, and much more. 

How do they find a way to keep the dark energy at bay and return it back to the board. 

That story, and much more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online. 
If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:
